object-template.name: PositionInterpolatorComponent
object-template.description: Component that will move the entity from the starting position to its offset.

property.name: MoveDuration
property.label: Move Duration
property.description: Time it takes to move from starting to ending position.

property.name: PauseDuration
property.label: Pause Duration
property.description: Time the component will pause animation at the start/end.

property.name: ReverseCycle
property.label: Reverse Cycle
property.description: Controls whether the enity will warp back to its original position, or animate in reverse back.

property.name: RepeatCount
property.label: Repeat Count
property.description: Number of times the animation will repeat for. 0 will repeat infinite times.

property.name: AutoActivate
property.label: Auto Activate
property.description: Determines whether the animation will automatically start or has to be manually triggered.

property.name: EasingFunction
property.label: Easing Function
property.description: Easing function that will be applied to the time value
